title: Weekday-Basis Seasonal Factors: Weekdays for Calculation
notes: The number of weekdays, or production days, in a month, alongside unadjusted motor vehicle assembly data from Table 3 of the G17, and the weekly-basis seasonal factors (SFW) are applied using the formula here (https://www.federalreserve.gov/releases/g17/mvsf.htm).
